result.title: Summer — Session #1 — Minimum Spanning Trees
result.content:
AlSalam Alikoom,

Please find below today's session resource, a list of problems that will help you to get started and a link to this week homework contest.

  • Introduction to Disjoint Set data structure
  • Introduction to Minimum Spanning Trees
  • Try solving some basic problems to test your new algorithms implementation on UVa as:
  1. https://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/106/10608.pdf
  2. https://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/106/10685.pdf
  3. https://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/11631.pdf
  4. https://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/9/908.pdf
  • TopCoder problem — TimeTravellingSalesman
  • One week long contest covering the homework problems

Thanks,
